__comment: by default, all feilds are required, except: link.emoji OR link.logo, link.color

data.title: Spaces for Designers
data.description: Good user experience and creativity is critical for any technology to reach the masses.

links.title: Getting started guide
links.description: A large collection of guides geared towards designers, and frontend developers to creating all sorts of bitcoin and lightning applications.

links.title: Join a community
links.description: Meet other designers, developers, copywriters, and other creatives working to drive bitcoin adoption through awesome UX.

links.title: Bitcoin UI Kit
links.description: A design system and UI kit to use as the foundation for prototypes, and concept explorations of your next bitcoin application.

links.title: What is Nostr?
links.description: A web-socket based social network that has caught the attention of Twitter's founder Jack Dorsey who's going to fund $5 million dollars for ecosystem projects.

links.title: Resources for developers
links.description: Building Nostr applications is super easy, you just need to know a bit of HTML+CSS and enough javascript to use websockets.

links.title: Slashtags
links.description: Tools for building peer-to-peer applications, and data storage without the need of a blockchain!
